title: Saving Private Ryan
description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: The Truman Show
description: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

title: The Big Lebowski
description: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

title: Shakespeare in Love
oscars_won_details: Best Original Musical or Comedy Score
description: The world's greatest playwright, William Shakespeare, is young, out of ideas and short of cash, but meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

title: American History X
description: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

title: Armageddon
description: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, NASA recruits a misfit team of deep core drillers to save the planet.

title: There's Something About Mary
description: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
description: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
description: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.

title: Rushmore
description: The extracurricular king of Rushmore Preparatory School is put on academic probation.

title: Mulan
description: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

title: A Bug's Life
description: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

title: The Thin Red Line
description: Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

title: Blade
description: A half-vampire, half-mortal man becomes a protector of the mortal race, while slaying evil vampires.

title: The Mask of Zorro
description: A young thief, seeking revenge for the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who also pursues vengeance of his own.

title: Elizabeth
description: The early years of the reign of Elizabeth I of England and her difficult task of learning what is necessary to be a monarch.

title: Dark City
description: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a nightmarish world with no sun and run by beings with telekinetic powers who seek the souls of humans.

title: Out of Sight
description: A career bank robber breaks out of jail and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a US Marshal he has kidnapped.

title: Ronin
description: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

title: Rounders
description: A young man is a reformed gambler who must return to playing big stakes poker to help a friend pay off loan sharks.

title: Pleasantville
description: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves in a 1950s sitcom where their influence begins to profoundly change the complacent world of the show.

title: The Wedding Singer
description: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

title: Enemy of the State
description: A lawyer becomes targeted by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a serious politically motivated crime.

title: Deep Impact
description: A comet is discovered to be on a collision course with Earth. As doomsday nears, the human race prepares for the worst.

title: Godzilla
description: A giant, reptilian monster surfaces, leaving destruction in its wake as it strides into New York City. To stop it, an earthworm scientist, his reporter ex-girlfriend, and other unlikely heroes team up to save their city.

title: The Parent Trap
description: Identical twins Hallie and Annie are separated after their parents' divorce. Years later, they discover each other at a summer camp and decide to switch places to reunite their parents.

title: You've Got Mail
description: Book superstore magnate Joe Fox and independent book shop owner Kathleen Kelly fall in love in the anonymity of the Internet, both unaware that he's trying to put her out of business.

title: Primary Colors
description: A man joins the political campaign of a smooth-operator candidate for President of the USA.

title: The Prince of Egypt
description: Egyptian Prince Moses learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

title: Antz
description: A rather neurotic ant tries to break from his totalitarian society while trying to win the affection of the princess he loves.

title: City of Angels
description: An angel who guides the souls of the recently deceased to the afterlife falls in love with a doctor.

title: What Dreams May Come
description: Chris Nielsen dies in an accident, and enters Heaven. But when he finds out that his beloved wife Annie has killed herself out of grief and embarked on a journey to Hell, he embarks on his own journey to save her.

title: Meet Joe Black
description: Death, who takes the form of a young man, asks a media mogul to act as a guide to teach him about life on Earth, and in the process, he falls in love with his guide's daughter.

title: Patch Adams
description: The true story of a heroic man, Hunter "Patch" Adams, determined to become a medical doctor because he enjoys helping people. He ventured where no doctor had ventured before, using humor and pathos.

title: Lethal Weapon 4
description: With personal crises and age weighing in on them, LAPD officers Riggs and Murtaugh must contend with deadly Chinese triads that are trying to free their former leaders out of prison and onto American soil.

title: The Waterboy
description: A college football team's waterboy discovers that he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.

title: Wild Things
description: A police detective uncovers a conspiracy behind a case involving a high-school guidance counselor when accusations of rape are made against him by two female students.

title: Pi
description: A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature.

title: Buffalo '66
description: Billy Brown, fresh out of jail, kidnaps a young woman and forces her to pretend to be his wife when he visits his parents.

title: A Simple Plan
description: Three acquaintances find a plane crash and a bag containing over $4 million in cash, and try to keep the money for themselves.

title: Gods and Monsters
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material Previously Produced or Published
description: The last days of Frankenstein director James Whale are explored.

title: Happiness
description: The lives of several individuals intersect as they try to find happiness and make connections with the people they love.

title: The Faculty
description: Students at Herrington High suspect their teachers are aliens from another planet.

title: Small Soldiers
description: When missile technology is used to enhance toy action figures, the toys soon begin to take their battle programming too seriously.

title: Velvet Goldmine
description: In 1984, a British journalist investigates the world of 1970s glam rock icon Brian Slade, who was at the peak of his career when he faked his own death.

title: He Got Game
description: A prisoner is granted temporary parole to convince his basketball star son to go to the governor's alma mater.

title: Ever After: A Cinderella Story
description: The Brothers Grimm arrive at the home of a wealthy Grande Dame who speaks of the many legends surrounding the fable of the cinder girl before telling the "true" story of her ancestor.

title: The Negotiator
description: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

title: Practical Magic
description: Two witch sisters, raised by their eccentric aunts in a small town, face closed-minded prejudice and a curse that threatens to prevent them from ever finding lasting love.

title: Bulworth
description: A suicidal politician puts a contract out on himself and takes the opportunity to be brutally honest with his voters.
